title: Lesson 80
paragraph: This lesson focuses on work and effort, highlighting industrious, diligent, and meticulous traits.

words.meaning: showing care and conscientiousness in work
words.example: He was diligent in completing his tasks.

words.japaneseMeaning: 細心の注意を払った、几帳面な
words.example: He was meticulous in his research.

words.meaning: wishing to do what is right; thorough and responsible
words.example: She is conscientious about her work.

words.meaning: continuing in a course of action despite difficulty
words.example: He is persevering in his studies.

words.meaning: devoted to a task or purpose
words.example: She is dedicated to helping the community.

words.meaning: done according to a systematic or established procedure
words.example: He approached the task in a methodical way.

words.meaning: done or acting according to a fixed plan or system
words.example: They conducted a systematic review of the data.

words.meaning: having or showing great effort or energy without getting tired
words.japaneseMeaning: 疲れ知らずの、精力的な
words.example: She worked tirelessly to complete the project.
